text: Sanjay Bhatia (born 21 January 1967) is a Bharatiya Janata Party politician from Haryana. He is currently an elected Member of Parliament from Karnal constituency of Haryana in 2019 Lok sabha polls and State general secretary at Bhartiya Janata Party (BJP), Haryana and former chairman, Haryana Khadi and Village Industries Board. == References == __INDEX__ Category:Living people Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Haryana Category:1967 births Category:Panipat Category:17th Lok Sabha members
title: Sanjay Bhatia
